name: 七楼幸存者
description:
·This is a 2.5d vampire survival like game where players collect coins by killing monsters, purchase and match skills between turns, and improve their survival ability.

·I have designed some resonance or binding effects for different skills, just like AutoChess.

·In the game, players can also permanently enhance their combat abilities through achievements and clearance rewards, in order to challenge higher difficulty levels.

·It is worth mentioning that the boss of this game will be quite challenging and may bring some pressure to players
